content: a modern skullcap-style crochet beanie in linen stitch aka moss stitch worked top-down and in the round so no seaming or assembly is required this pattern is written using us terminology and is ideal for someone who has conquered the basics of crochet and wants a quick satisfying project to put their new skills to the test the pattern pdf includes links to several video tutorials demonstrating how to create a magic_ring work into a chain space and finish with a faux stitch **sizes ** s m l **to fit head circumference ** 50 54cm 55 59cm 60 64cm 20 21 inches 22 23 inches 24 25 inches **gauge ** 15 sts x 18 row in linen stitch = 10cm x 10cm / 4 inches x 4 inches **hook ** 6 00mm hook **yarn ** 99m 108m 126m / 108yds 118yds 138yds of any 10 ply/aran weight wool or wool-cotton blend yarn examples pictured x1 hank of amano warmi 100g/150m ea **or** x1 hank of dempstah citizen wolf 10ply 100g/170m ea **or** x2 balls of sesia lana ecologica 50g/84m ea **difficulty** beginner-intermediate
